Sentencas: An optimum method is proposed to prepare thin foil transmission electron microscopy (TEM) lamellae of multiphase porous functional ceramics: prefilling the pore space of these materials with an epoxy resin prior to focused ion beam milling.
Titulo: Transmission Electron Microscopy Specimen Preparation Method for Multiphase Porous Functional Ceramics

Sentencas: Several advantages of epoxy impregnation are demonstrated by successful preparation of TEM specimens that maintain the structural integrity of the entire lamella.
Titulo: Transmission Electron Microscopy Specimen Preparation Method for Multiphase Porous Functional Ceramics

Sentencas: Feasibility of the TEM alignment procedure is demonstrated, and ideal TEM analyses are illustrated on solid oxide fuel cell and solid oxide electrolysis cell materials.
Titulo: Transmission Electron Microscopy Specimen Preparation Method for Multiphase Porous Functional Ceramics

Sentencas: Some potential drawbacks of the TEM specimen preparation method are listed for other samples.
Titulo: Transmission Electron Microscopy Specimen Preparation Method for Multiphase Porous Functional Ceramics
